content.full_text:
Data manage ment plan CIPT  
This research project will deal with 3 types of data. The first is data provided by the experimental  
setups . The second is collected data from simulations . The third type is papers, master theses and PhD 
theses generated within the CAPTIN II project. The Leblebici research group has a data storage capacity 
of close to 20TB at the moment. The data will be stored in the group repositories during the project 
and maintained for at least another five years after the project end. During the research project, the 
PhD student and the post -doctoral researcher will co -manage these dat a with Prof. Leblebici. At the 
end of the project, the management responsibility of the data will pass to Prof. Leblebici, and iRODS 
data storage is envisaged. Besides the data, the project will generate a significant amount of code. The 
code will be store d in the KULeuven GitLab repository on the CIPT group repository channel.

During the research project, the PhD student and the post -doctoral researcher will co -manage these dat a with Prof. Leblebici. At the end of the project, the management responsibility of the data will pass to Prof. Leblebici, and iRODS data storage is envisaged.
